channel.title: [317] RankTex-Scape [ALLSTAR]
channel.description:
I AM BEING MODERATED BECAUSE OF A "TROLL" COMMENT AND I CAN NOT REPLY TO ANYONE WITHOUT A MODERATOR APPROVING MY REPLY. BEST WAY TO CONTACT ME IS SKYPE. ADD ME ON SKYPE: modcodygodex Thanks.
[center][URL=http://imgur.com/HJXsIl0][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HJXsIl0.png[/img][/URL][/center] Hello, Moparscape! This is my development thread so you guys know what I am up to on my server. THIS IS NOT AN ADVERTISEMENT, BUT A DEVELOPMENT THREAD. :)
[center]Dedicated Staff Team: Mod Cody - Server Development Mod Reaperx - Server Development xX4m4zingXx - Client Development
INFORMATION: -All bugs fixed (that I know of) -3 Fun mini-games -Dungeoneering -Slower XP rates (not super easy, but not too hard to level up) -Donator Zone -Helper Zone -Great custom items -Almsot perfect pking -Perfect Lottery (Credits to I C E M A N) -Clan Chat (almost perfect) -A lot more info[/center]
Pictures: Vesta's Spear [URL=http://imgur.com/t4O7TuR][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/t4O7TuR.png[/img][/URL]
Vesta's Longsword [URL=http://imgur.com/vuyKkWU][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vuyKkWU.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imgur.com/iAzKhkY][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iAzKhkY.png[/img][/URL]
Top Hat [URL=http://imgur.com/IaURUtd][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IaURUtd.png[/img][/URL]
Dice [URL=http://imgur.com/2lhvgtg][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2lhvgtg.png[/img][/URL]
Death Cape [URL=http://imgur.com/5VuxtHQ][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5VuxtHQ.png[/img][/URL]
Dragon Claws [URL=http://imgur.com/HPrADwF][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HPrADwF.png[/img][/URL]
Sorry about not having much info or pictures at the moment, I WILL be adding a lot more on this thread. Comment and let me know what you think! Thanks for viewing!
<-- I am being Moderated because of a "troll" comment. -.-

item.title: [317] RankTex-Scape [ALLSTAR]
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“RankTex, post:11, topic:522024”][quote author=Str Pker CODER link=topic=640529.msg4317886#msg4317886 date=1371784254]
When is this going to be up?
[/quote]

Maybe in about a month. I am working on World 1: Allstar and World 2: Delta. Delta is going to have WAY more better features, and I have been the only one working on it recently. I have it on Hamachi for beta testing right now, but it will be on VPS hosting when it is finally up.[/quote]
Yeah, why don’t we all use the poorly programmed bases right?

Read full topic

item.description:
@RankTex wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:2, topic:522024”]You’ve just recently made a thread for this server’s development. If you for some reason can’t access your original account message an administrator.
The original is here.[/quote]

Yes, I did make a thread for this, but it had nothing on it pretty much. And that account can not be accessed. I do not have the password, and I don’t remember my email for that account. The reason I can’t use that account is because I got a new computer and my info was not saved on my browser.

EDIT: An Error Has Occurred!

when I click the link.
